about_the_game:
The music from TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2, from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with a medley of tracks from the second game in the series. (MP3s)

detailed_description:
SPECIAL NOTE

If you have purchased the soundtrack pack for TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4 on Steam, you do NOT need to purchase this DLC - these are the same MP3s as are available for that soundtrack pack.


About the Game

The music from TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2, from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with a medley of tracks from the second game in the series. (MP3s)

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2 Soundtrack - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8/8.1 (32bit and 64bit), Windows® 10 (32bit and 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 1.8 GHz CPU dual-core. AMD 2.0 GHz dual-core.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 260 / Radeon HD 4000 Series / Intel HD Graphics 4000 with OpenGL 3.3 minimum.
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
  • Additional Notes: Xinput controller compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8/8.1 (32bit and 64bit), Windows® 10 (32bit and 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel quad-core 3.0 GHz or dual-core 3.2 GHz. AMD 3.4 GHz quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 2GB / Radeon HD 7970 3GB with OpenGL 3.3 minimum.
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
  • Additional Notes: Xinput controller compliant

short_description: The complete sound selection from TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2, from original composer George Stamatiadis, with a medley of tracks from from the second game in the series. (MP3s)
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
